## Courses

**Unlock Your Potential in Research, Statistics, and Data Science**

Immerse yourself in the world of research with data science through the SARA Summer School. Our intensive training program is designed to equip participants with the essential skills and knowledge needed to excel in conducting research using data science tool [R](https://www.r-project.org/about.html).

Each day will start with a guest lecturer (around 45-55 minutes) from a distinguished international faculty. Later, [Ajay Kumar Koli](https://koliajay.netlify.app/) will teach most of the courses.

The course slides are [here](https://sara-course-r4b.netlify.app/).

Participants will be doing the following courses:

<br>

**5 Days Courses (9 am to 12:30 pm & 1:30 pm to 6 pm; 40 hours):**

**22-26 July 2024**

<br>
